details.description: The StateDefinition interface was completely undocumented. It defines state name and allowed transitions.
The 'name' field of StateDefinition was not documented. It represents the state's identifier.
The 'allowedTransitions' field was not documented. It defines which states can be reached from this state.
The TransitionEvent interface was completely undocumented. It represents a state transition with metadata.
The TransitionHook type was not documented. It defines the callback signature for transition events.
While the method had a JSDoc comment, the GUIDE.md had no documentation or examples for this critical API.
While the method had a JSDoc comment, the GUIDE.md had no documentation or examples for initializing the machine.
While the method had a JSDoc comment, the GUIDE.md lacked comprehensive documentation and usage examples.
The GUIDE.md had no documentation on how to retrieve the current state.
The GUIDE.md had no documentation on accessing the transition history.
The GUIDE.md had no documentation on registering callbacks for state transitions.
The GUIDE.md had no documentation on checking if a transition is allowed before attempting it.
The GUIDE.md lacked documentation on resetting the machine and enumerating registered states.
